 2001-01512001-01-300,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
PrecisEnactment of the DEDUCTION FOR PROVINCIAL REBATE (GST/HST) REGULATIONS which allow vendors to provide their customers with a rebate, at the point of sale, on the provincial component of the HST imposed on printed books and related items, such as "talking books".
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0065 Publication Date: 2001-02-14
